query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Design of training activities and materials
result.description: This deliverable will include a detailed typology of training material that is available to different stakeholders and user groups in the field of citizen science identifying needs priorities and gaps It will also catalogue the existing material that is currently available in different areas of citizen science and the main thematic organisation that will be used in the platform It will provide instructions and protocols for building new training modules to be integrated into the platform for external stakeholders

result.title: Interim Impact Assessment Report
result.description: The interim impact assessment report discusses the evaluation activities until year 2 and presents an analysis of the corresponding results The report will include an indepth analysis and mapping across activities defined indicators and project performance This report will also inform other WPs and the management on possible implications for the final project period

result.title: Final Impact Assessment Report
result.description: This report present a full summary of evaluation results of the project and the validation of the overall impact on scientific social ecological and political level in accordance with MORRI and SDG indicators The document will also reflect on possible implications for future activities of the community beyond the funding period This will include a set of guidelines and instruments for impact assessment in the future

category.title: Legal Basis
category.description: Programme: Legal basis for research funding

result.title: Guidance document on RRI-oriented grounding actions
result.description: The guidance document will be a reference document to support the GRACE implementing organizations and an example for others outside the consortium after the end of the project to pursue their RRI development according to their personalized roadmap It will include the revised version of the six Roadmaps one for each implementing organisation containing the GAs to be implemented in the next 5 years and the sustainability arrangements for ensuring the continuation of the GAs initiated under GRACE the lessons learned from the mutual learning activities the impact assessment of the GAs and the preassessment of those included in the six Roadmaps and other possible resources which could be considered useful for implementing organisations to implement the planned GAs Particular attention will be devoted to the identification of strategies and approaches favouring a rapid attainment of visible and effective institutional changes paving the way to further permanent RRIoriented impacts in the middle and long run
